content.question: A. Describe the dependency ratio indicated by the shape of the population pyramid shown. B. Explain ONE economic factor that may contribute to the local population trend shown in the graph. C. Explain the degree to which environmental push factors may affect the population structure for the community shown in the graph. D. Explain a possible outcome regarding future housing demand based on the population pyramid shown.

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain what maps or data imply or illustrate about geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
